com.jcabi.http.mock.MkAnswer

    Package Description
    com.jcabi.http.mock
    Mock of Servlet Container.

      Matches the value of the MkAnswer's body bytes against the given matcher.

      Matches the content of the MkAnswer's header against the given matcher.
